name: smart-form-filler-ai
description: AI-powered job application form filler Chrome extension

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/background && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp background/service-worker.js dist/background/ && cp -r content popup styles icons dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../smart-form-filler-ai-v2.0.0.zip . && cd .. && echo '✅ Package created: smart-form-filler-ai-v2.0.0.zip'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting...' && node -c background/service-worker.js && node -c content/content.js && node -c popup/popup.js && echo '✅ No syntax errors'
scripts.prerelease: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && echo '✅ Pre-release checks passed'

author: Akash Ranjan
